summary: TRANSMISSION LINKAGE PROBLEMS.  WHEN SLOWING AT TRAFFIC LIGHTS OR WHILE IN MOTION, UPON ACCELERATION, TRANSMISSION DOWNSHIFTS AND THEN UPSHIFTS ABRUPTLY IN A VERY DISTURBING ABNORMAL WAY.  IT HAPPENS CONSTANTLY DURING NORMAL CITY DRIVING.  YOU MUST BE VERY CAREFUL TO BE "GENTLE" WHEN ACCELERATING AFTER SLOWING DOWN.  THIS WILL BE MY VERY LAST TOYOTA.
